mutants.code:
import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s)
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s)
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('\\s', 'MUTATED', s)
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s)
    s = s[::-1]
    return s

    s = s[::-1]

def reverse_string(s):

    s = s[::+1]
    return s

import re

def reverse_string(s):
    s = re.sub('\\s', '', s)
    s = re.sub('[^A-Za-z]', '', s)
    s = s[::--1]
    return s
